channel.title: Help server portforwarding
channel.description: ugh just noticed the only thing i portforwarded was the 43594 through utorrent... i guess i really do need help on portforwarding... if anyone is willing to help, because i've done everything i was told to do and followed many tuts for many many months... but it was only utorrent that worked i guess, anyone can help me pm me im on all day I need help getting the normal way to portforward so i can have 2+ servers on as if their diff worlds
